name: Blacksea Odyssey
overview: Monster hunting in the cosmic abyss The hunt is on! Get ready to battle colossal space monsters in Blacksea Odyssey, a savage, top-down rogue-lite shoot ‘em up RPG. The greatest huntsmen in the universe have gathered for the Blacksea Odyssey – a legendary tournament that plunges competitors deep into the cosmic abyss on a deadly hunt for the most fearsome creatures that dwell within the void. Key features - Brutal dismemberment: eviscerate deadly beasts by ripping them apart with your harpoon - Massive bosses: take down true behemoths so colossal they span multiple screens - Destructible everything: blast through space-scape environments with your ship, spear or harpoon - Action-packed combat: reminiscent of classic top-down shooters mixed with modern RPG and rogue-like mechanics - Expansive customization: forge millions of runic modifications for your spear and ship - Hardcore rogue-like elements: perma-death, procedural levels, and incredible replayability
